to_address: "Speakup is a screen review system for Linux." <speakup@braille.uwo.ca>
subject: Re: Ubuntu
body:
-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA512

Hi. Ubuntu Feisty Fawn, AKA Ubuntu-7.04 is out now. Afaik the most up-to-date instructions for getting the liveCD up and talking, can be found at http://live.gnome.org/Orca/UbuntuFeisty
- - Igor
On Sat, Apr 28, 2007 at 02:59:30PM -0400, ace wrote:
> Hey,
> 
> I have downloaded Ubuntu 6.1 and burnt it to a CD.  I saw someone's 
> instructions pertaining to how to start speech with it but they did not 
> work when I tried them.  I also tried searching the site for information 
> but couldn't find any.  Thanks for any information.
> 
> -- 
> ace
> Network Administrator of
> irc.talkingirc.net
> http://www.talkingirc.net
> 
> 
> _______________________________________________
> Speakup mailing list
> Speakup@braille.uwo.ca
> http://speech.braille.uwo.ca/mailman/listinfo/speakup
> 
> --

> dangerous content by MailScanner, and is
> believed to be clean.
